text: The 2017 Brisbane Broncos season is the 30th in the club's history. Coached by Wayne Bennett, and captained by Darius Boyd, they compete in the NRL's 2017 Telstra Premiership. Prior to the start of the Premiership season, the Broncos competed in the 2017 NRL Auckland Nines, finishing first in their pool, but lost the Quarter-Final. ==Squad== ===Movements=== ====Gains==== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#efefef" !width="120" | Player !width="210" | Signed From !width="70" | Until End of !width="40" | Notes |- |David Mead|| Gold Coast Titans|| || |- |Korbin Sims|| Newcastle Knights||2019|| |- |Tautau Moga|| North Queensland Cowboys||2019|| |- |Benji Marshall|| St. George Illawarra Dragons||2017|| |- |Mitchell Dodds|| Warrington Wolves||2017|| |} ====Losses==== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- bgcolor="#efefef" !width="120" | Player !width="210" | Signed To !width="70" | Until End of !width="40" | Notes |- |Corey Parker||Retirement||-|| |- |Jack Reed||Retirement||-|| |- |Greg Eden|| Castleford Tigers||2019|| |- |Lachlan Maranta||Queensland Reds|| || |- |Jarrod Wallace|| Gold Coast Titans||2019|| |- |} ==Ladder== ==Fixtures== ===Pre- season=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:75%;" |- ! width="115" | Date ! width="170" | Opponent ! width="130" | Venue ! width="50" | Score ! width="285" | Tries ! width="155" | Goals |- bgcolor= #CCFFCC |Saturday, 4 February|| Cronulla Sharks||Dolphin Oval||style="text-align:center;"|30 - 12 ||Pangai Jr., Isaako, Ese’ese, Glenn, Ofahengaue ||Isaako (5/5) |- ! colspan="8" | Legend: |- |} ====NRL Auckland Nines==== The NRL Auckland Nines is a pre-season rugby league nines competition featuring all 16 NRL clubs. The 2017 competition was played over two days on 4 and 5 February at Eden Park. The Broncos featured in the Rangitoto pool and played the Knights, Tigers and Storm. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:75%;" |- ! width="115" | Date ! width="50" | Time (Local) ! width="60" | Round ! width="170" | Opponent ! width="130" | Venue ! width="50" | Score ! width="285" | Tries ! width="155" | Goals |- bgcolor= #CCFFCC |Saturday, 4 February||style="text- align:center;"|2:15pm||style="text-align:center;"|Round 1|| Melbourne Storm||Eden Park||style="text-align:center;"|18 -
